inputs.name: udap_fhir_base_url
inputs._description: Base FHIR URL of FHIR Server. Discovery request will be sent to {baseURL}/.well-known/udap

inputs.name: flow_type_auth_code
inputs._title: Required OAuth2.0 Flow Type for Authorization Code Workflow
inputs._description: Which grant type(s) must be supported per the returned Discovery metadata

inputs._title: Auth Server Trust Anchor X509 Certificate(s) (PEM Format)
inputs._description:
A list of one or more trust anchor root CA X.509 certificates, separated by a newline. Inferno will use
            these to establish
            trust with the authorization server's certificates provided in the discovery response signed_metadata JWT.

inputs.name: reg_grant_type_auth_code
inputs._description:
The OAuth2.0 grant type for which this client will register itself. A given client may register as either
             option, but not both.

inputs.name: udap_client_cert_pem_auth_code_flow

inputs._description:
A list of one or more X.509 certificates in PEM format separated by a newline. The first (leaf) certificate
            MUST represent the client entity Inferno will register as,
            and the trust chain that will be built from the provided certificate(s) must resolve to a CA trusted by the
            authorization server under test.

inputs.name: udap_client_private_key_auth_code_flow
inputs._title: Authorization Code Client Private Key (PEM Format)
inputs._description:
The private key corresponding to the client certificate used for registration, in PEM format.  Used to sign
          registration and/or authentication JWTs.

inputs.name: udap_cert_iss_auth_code_flow
inputs._description:
MUST correspond to a unique URI entry in the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) extension of the client
            certificate used for registration.

inputs.name: udap_registration_scope_auth_code_flow
inputs._description:
String containing a space delimited list of scopes requested by the client application for use in
                  subsequent requests. The Authorization Server MAY consider this list when deciding the scopes that it
                  will allow the application to subsequently request. Apps requesting the "authorization_code" grant
                  type SHOULD request user or patient scopes.

inputs.name: udap_jwt_signing_alg
inputs._description:
Algorithm used to sign UDAP JSON Web Tokens (JWTs). UDAP Implementations SHALL support
            RS256.

inputs.name: udap_registration_certifications_auth_code_flow
inputs._description:
Additional UDAP certifications to include in registration request, if required by the authorization server.
             Include a space separated list of strings representing a Base64-encoded, signed JWT.

inputs.name: flow_type_client_creds
inputs._title: Required OAuth2.0 Flow Type for Client Credentials Workflow
inputs._description: Which grant type(s) must be supported per the returned Discovery metadata

inputs.name: reg_grant_type_client_creds
inputs._description:
The OAuth2.0 grant type for which this client will register itself. A given client may register as either
             option, but not both.

inputs.name: udap_client_cert_pem_client_creds_flow

inputs._description:
A list of one or more X.509 certificates in PEM format separated by a newline. The first (leaf) certificate
            MUST represent the client entity Inferno will register as,
            and the trust chain that will be built from the provided certificate(s) must resolve to a CA trusted by the
            authorization server under test.

inputs.name: udap_client_private_key_client_creds_flow
inputs._title: Client Credentials Client Private Key (PEM Format)
inputs._description:
The private key corresponding to the client certificate used for registration, in PEM format.  Used to sign
          registration and/or authentication JWTs.

inputs.name: udap_cert_iss_client_creds_flow
inputs._description:
MUST correspond to a unique URI entry in the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) extension of the client
            certificate used for registration.

inputs.name: udap_registration_scope_client_creds_flow
inputs._description:
String containing a space delimited list of scopes requested by the client application for use in
                  subsequent requests. The Authorization Server MAY consider this list when deciding the scopes that it
                  will allow the application to subsequently request. Apps requesting the "client_credentials" grant
                  type SHOULD request system scopes.

inputs.name: udap_registration_certifications_client_creds_flow
inputs._description:
Additional UDAP certifications to include in registration request, if required by the authorization server.
             Include a space separated list of strings representing a Base64-encoded, signed JWT.
